name: ExposureType
title: Exposure Type
description: Exposure Type codes for insurance operations.

concept.definition: Property has three or more entities with a secured interest recorded against it.
Property owner who does not reside at or actively manage the rental property.

concept.display: Acids, Alkalis or Other Reactive Chemicals
concept.definition: Storage or use of corrosive or chemically reactive substances.

designation.value: Acides, Alcalis ou Autres Produits Chimiques Réactifs
Ácidos, Álcalis u Otros Químicos Reactivos

concept.definition: Operations involving aircraft, spacecraft, or related equipment.
Sale, service, or storage of alcoholic beverages.
Off-road recreational vehicles designed for rough terrain.
Entertainment or leisure activities offered to the public.
Facility where animals compete in racing events.
Public exhibitions featuring animals.
Location where beehives are kept for honey production.
Facility designed for practicing archery with bow and arrow.
History of intentionally set fires at the property.
Presence of fibrous mineral material known for health hazards.
Conditions on property that may attract and endanger children.
Bulk storage of combustible or reactive materials in bags or sacks.

designation.value: Sacs Contenant des Nitrates ou du Sucre

concept.definition: Business or individual has filed for bankruptcy or is insolvent.
Lodging establishment offering overnight accommodation and breakfast.
Use of explosives to break or remove rock, earth, or structures.
History of structural failure or building being moved from original location.
Temporary housing or leasing of animals, equipment, or space.
Raising animals for reproductive purposes.
Earth-moving operations using heavy machinery.
Commercial activities conducted on the premises.
Slaughtering and processing of animals for meat.

designation.value: Produits Chimiques (acide, benzine, benzène, kérosène, solvants, etc.)
Centres de Soins pour Personnes Âgées, Jeunes, Personnes Handicapées
Centros de Convalecencia/Cuidado para Ancianos, Jóvenes, Discapacitados

concept.display: Custom Application of Chemicals, Fertilizers, etc.

designation.value: Application Personnalisée de Produits Chimiques, Fertilisants, etc.
Aplicación Personalizada de Químicos, Fertilizantes, etc.
Hôpital, Clinique de Santé, Services Sociaux
Hospital, Clínica de Salud, Servicios Sociales
Vente au Détail ou Service Incident N.C.A.

concept.display: Land occupied by persons other than insured for commercial purposes

designation.value: Terrain occupé par des tiers à des fins commerciales
Terreno Ocupado por Personas Distintas al Asegurado para Propósitos Comerciales
Limpieza de Terreno, Quema de Maleza

concept.display: Liquified Petroleum or Liquified Natural Gas (LNG)

designation.value: Pétrole Liquéfié ou Gaz Naturel Liquéfié (GNL)
Gas Licuado de Petróleo o Gas Natural Licuado (GNL)

Ventas de Leche al por Mayor
Piste ou Sentier de Véhicules Motorisés
Élevage d'Animaux de Compagnie (chats, chiens, etc.)
Pollution de l'Air, Liquide ou Solide

concept.display: Refreshment Stands (not restaurants) - serving nonalcoholic beverages or food for consumption off premises

designation.value: Kiosques de Rafraîchissements (non restaurants) - servant des boissons non alcoolisées ou aliments pour consommation hors du local
Puestos de Refrescos (no restaurantes) - sirviendo bebidas no alcohólicas o comida para consumo fuera del local

Tir aux Plateaux ou au Pigeon
